author: kgiusti
msg: QPID-3073: fix to allow older versions of boost to compile.

author: danielsh
msg: Allow 'make svnserveautocheck' to run a threaded svnserve.
Pass -T to svnserve iff $THREADED is not empty.

author: hwright
msg: Update the wc-ng stat caching code to use the well-established stringbuf,
(get_path_kind): Use the stringbuf to store the cached values.
(svn_wc__db_t): Use a stringbuf instead of a string/size combination.

author: jochen
msg: Documented the requirement to use a comparator.
